summary: The diff implements all five requirements. Backend mock data was updated with realistic ASINs, prices, and product names. Data validation logging was added in searchProducts. Frontend ProductCard was verified to correctly display productName, asin, and price fields with extensive debug logging and validation checks.

hallucinated_features.description: Added migration.mo file with OldProduct, OldOpportunityScore, OldActor, NewActor types and run function
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest does not mention creating a migration module or adding migration support. The migration.mo file and '(with migration = Migration.run)' in main.mo were not requested.
